languages.text: Кьява Гамма избыла следы былого осквернения, покрыв себя славой набожного и продуктивного мира. Усердный труд и пытливое штудирование таинств Технологии восславляли Деус Механикус.

Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement and became known as a pious and productive world. Hard work and inquisitive study of the mysteries of Technology glorified the Deus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: Кьява Гамма избыла следы былого осквернения, покрыв себя славой набожного и продуктивного мира. Усердный труд и пытливое штудирование таинств Технологии восславляли Деус Механикус.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of former defilement and became known as a pious and productive world. Hard work and inquisitive study of the mysteries of Technology glorified the Deus Mechanicus.
Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of former defilement and became known as a pious and productive world. Hard work and inquisitive study of the mysteries of Technology glorified the Deus Mechanicus.

Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement and became known as a pious and productive world. Hard work and inquisitive study of the mysteries of Technology glorified the Deus Mechanicus.

languages.text: 基亚瓦伽马星净化了原本的污点，成为了虔诚而产能丰富的世界。所有人都在辛勤工作，不断研究着技术的奥秘，赞颂着万机之神的名字。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement and became known as a pious and productive world. Hard work and inquisitive study of the mysteries of Technology glorified the Deus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: 基亚瓦伽马星净化了原本的污点，成为了虔诚而产能丰富的世界。所有人都在辛勤工作，不断研究着技术的奥秘，赞颂着万机之神的名字。

languages.text: キアヴァ・ガンマはかつての汚染の染みを洗い流し、敬虔かつ生産的な惑星として知られるようになった。神秘の技術を勤勉かつ熱心に研究し、デウス・メカニクスの栄光を讃えた。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement and became known as a pious and productive world. Hard work and inquisitive study of the mysteries of Technology glorified the Deus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: キアヴァ・ガンマはかつての汚染の染みを洗い流し、敬虔かつ生産的な惑星として知られるようになった。神秘の技術を勤勉かつ熱心に研究し、デウス・メカニクスの栄光を讃えた。

languages.text: Kiava Gamma se purgea de son ancienne souillure et gagna une réputation de monde pieux et productif. Le labeur et l'étude approfondie des mystères de la Technologie honorèrent le Deus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement and became known as a pious and productive world. Hard work and inquisitive study of the mysteries of Technology glorified the Deus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma se purgea de son ancienne souillure et gagna une réputation de monde pieux et productif. Le labeur et l'étude approfondie des mystères de la Technologie honorèrent le Deus Mechanicus.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma se purificó de su anterior corrupción y acabó siendo conocido como un mundo pío y productivo. El trabajo duro y el estudio inquisitivo de los misterios de la Tecnología glorificaron al Deus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement and became known as a pious and productive world. Hard work and inquisitive study of the mysteries of Technology glorified the Deus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma se purificó de su anterior corrupción y acabó siendo conocido como un mundo pío y productivo. El trabajo duro y el estudio inquisitivo de los misterios de la Tecnología glorificaron al Deus Mechanicus.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma entfernte den Makel seiner früheren Schändung und wurde zu einer frommen und produktiven Welt. Harte Arbeit und intensive Studien der Geheimnisse der Technologie zur Verehrung des Deus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement and became known as a pious and productive world. Hard work and inquisitive study of the mysteries of Technology glorified the Deus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma entfernte den Makel seiner früheren Schändung und wurde zu einer frommen und produktiven Welt. Harte Arbeit und intensive Studien der Geheimnisse der Technologie zur Verehrung des Deus Mechanicus.

languages.text: Kiava Gama, eski kirliliğinin izlerini üzerinden atıp dini bütün ve üretken bir dünya olarak bilinmeye başlandı. Adanmışlığı ve Teknolojinin gizemlerine dair merak uyandırıcı çalışmaları ile Deus Mechanicus'un şanına şan kattı.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement and became known as a pious and productive world. Hard work and inquisitive study of the mysteries of Technology glorified the Deus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gama eski kirliliğinin izlerini üzerinden attı ve dini bütün ve üretken bir dünya olarak bilinmeye başlandı. Adanmışlığı ve Teknoloji'nin gizemlerine dair merak uyandıran çalışmaları ile Deus Mechanicus'un şanına şan kattı.
